issue.title: eksisozluk1923.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://eksisozluk1923.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Feksisozluk1923.com) ### Comment > eksisozluk1923 and its old versions had a double click problem where you needed to double click every link on the website because the first click would only trigger an ad and nothing would happen. The ad that got triggered had the class "ad-doubleclickwebinterstital". > > AdGuard Turkish has a rule for this in the TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt file: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.ad-doubleclickwebinterstital { remove: true; }" > > This rule has been preventing the double click problem for a while. Now it seems like the website added another element that causes the double click problem, which has the class "interstitial-close-link-source". > > I can confirm that adding this rule to My Filters fixes the problem: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.interstitial-close-link-source { remove: true; }" > > So maybe that could be added alongside the old class rule. Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WOOi4wD.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://eksisozluk1923.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Feksisozluk1923.com) ### Comment > eksisozluk1923 and its old versions had a double click problem where you needed to double click every link on the website because the first click would only trigger an ad and nothing would happen. The ad that got triggered had the class "ad-doubleclickwebinterstital". > > AdGuard Turkish has a rule for this in the TurkishFilter/sections/css_extended.txt file: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.ad-doubleclickwebinterstital { remove: true; }" > > This rule has been preventing the double click problem for a while. Now it seems like the website added another element that causes the double click problem, which has the class "interstitial-close-link-source". > > I can confirm that adding this rule to My Filters fixes the problem: > "eksisozluk1923.com#$?#.interstitial-close-link-source { remove: true; }" > > So maybe that could be added alongside the old class rule. Thank you ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.bluestoneperennials.com/plants/type/bulbs/genus/lily](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bluestoneperennials.com%2Fplants%2Ftype%2Fbulbs%2Fgenus%2Flily) ### Comment > When I have AdGuard turned on, I will start scrolling on this website, and suddenly, the website is dim (an overlay), and I can't interact with the website anymore. If I refresh the page, I can begin interacting with the site again until I start to scroll and the website "dims" again. Once I turned AdGuard off (added this site to my allow list) and refreshed, it was evident to me that the "dimming" effect was the overlay used with the popup in the attached screenshot; however, AdGuard can block the email sign-up pop-up but not the overlay that accompanies it. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

comment.body:
It seems filtering is not working on your device.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

commits.message:
Remove Cloudflare challenge false positive and fix detection of JS error beacons (#152306)

* Remove Cloudflare Challenge/Turnstile path

Requests to `/cdn-cgi/challenge-platform/*` on websites behind
Cloudflare are required for challenge pages and Turnstile to work
correctly.

References:
- `https://blog.cloudflare.com/turnstile-private-captcha-alternative/`
- `https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/get-started/reference/cdn-cgi-endpoint/#cdn-cgi-endpoint:~:text=/cdn%2Dcgi/challenge%2Dplatform/`

* Fix Cloudflare JavaScript error logging URL

This endpoint is used to log JavaScript errors while executing
challenges, but the `g` in the URL can be other values.

pull_request.title: Remove Cloudflare challenge false positive and fix detection of JS error beacons
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

Fixes users being unable to solve Cloudflare's anti-bot challenge pages and widget.
Fixes incomplete JS error beacon URL.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [X] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

1) Removes Cloudflare Challenge/Turnstile path 

Requests to `/cdn-cgi/challenge-platform/*` on websites behind
Cloudflare are required for challenge pages and Turnstile to work
correctly.

References:
- https://blog.cloudflare.com/turnstile-private-captcha-alternative/
- https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/get-started/reference/cdn-cgi-endpoint/#cdn-cgi-endpoint:~:text=/cdn%2Dcgi/challenge%2Dplatform/

2) Fixes Cloudflare JavaScript error logging URL

This endpoint is used to log JavaScript errors while executing
challenges, but the `g` in the URL can be other values.

### Enter the issue address

None existing.

### Add your comment and screenshots

See comment above.

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

Other ad blocker

Missed ads or ad leftovers

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyPrivacy, NoCoin Filter List, Legitimate URL Shortener

_No response_

all msn site the are launched through Microsoft start has this ads leftover
